titleStmt.title: The case of Madam Mary Carleton, lately stiled the German Princess, truely stated with an historical relation of her birth, education, and fortunes; in an appeal to his illustrious Highness Prince Rupert. By the said Mary Carleton.
titleStmt.author: Carleton, Mary, 1642?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam: Speed at the Rainbow in Fleetstreet, and Hen: Marsh at the Princes Arms in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Text is continuous despite pagination and register.
